main event: On May 6, 1957, several witnesses reported observing unidentified flying objects in Washington, D.C.
interesting points: Witnesses described three cigar-shaped objects that were bluish-green in color and silent,The objects were observed traveling at a high rate of speed, estimated around 30-40 feet in diameter,The sighting lasted approximately 15 minutes,The objects maintained a straight flight path before disappearing,Investigators noted the sighting could not be explained and no known aircraft matched the description.
